The `withmargins` is an R package that summarize data with margins (totals) and expand data by treating margins as category levels. Supports 'tidyverse' workflows for analysis and visualization.

## Installation

You can install `withmargins` from CRAN:

``` r
install.packages("withmargins")
```
You can install the development version of `withmargins` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("sayuks/withmargins")
```
